synopsis.text:
Her alding an era of tranquility, superpowered beings known as 'Heroes' emerged in the 21st century, averting global conflict and safeguarding their respective nations. Among these guardians is Shy, Japan's youthful protector, who grapples with an unanticipated foe: her own debilitating timidity.

As a 14-year-old middle school student, Teru Momijiyama assumes her secret identity as Shy, a symbol of hope for her country. Despite her inexperience and wavering self-assurance, she is unwavering in her pursuit of justice and peace. As formidable adversaries arise, Shy must forge alliances with fellow heroes and navigate the complexities of her role as a guardian.

In this captivating narrative, follow Shy's journey as she harnesses her extraordinary abilities and confronts her personal limitations. Amid escalating threats and self-discovery, witness the transformation of a bashful heroine into a beacon of courage and resilience.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
